ygData.subject: Read, about TM4 Driver
ygData.msgSnippet: Shomin, you brought in a TM3 driver, didn t ya?  And evidently it s either destroyed or your characters can t get to it.  So you bring in a TM4 driver?  Excuse

    Shomin, you brought in a TM3 driver, didn't ya?  And evidently it's 
either destroyed or your characters can't get to it.  So you bring in a TM4 
driver?  Excuse me if I scoff a little!
    This is getting ridiculous, and out of hand.  First the magical driver, 
then the magical speaking with the Matrix and Oracle and such, and now this 
crap.  Believe me, I'm not going to let that driver be legal.  Your 
characters finding all the super powerful stuff, is not fair.  And having 
them just appear, is also unfair.


Lord Unitron
KSLawDogg@...
